import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RequestContextService } from '../../../core/services/request.context'; @Component({ selector: 'app-coding-challenges-header', standalone: false, templateUrl: './coding-challenges-header.html', styleUrl: './coding-challenges-header.scss' }) export class CodingChallengesHeader { isLoggedIn: boolean = false; constructor(private requestContext: RequestContextService) { this.isLoggedIn = this.requestContext.isLoggedIn; } }
